properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT secret key for token signing and verification

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: letterboxd.event-hub.retry.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed events

properties.name: letterboxd.event-hub.retry.delay
properties.description: Initial delay in milliseconds between retry attempts

properties.name: letterboxd.event-hub.routing.default-exchange
properties.description: Default RabbitMQ exchange for event routing

properties.name: letterboxd.event-hub.routing.dead-letter-exchange
properties.description: Dead letter exchange for failed events
